features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增分屏保存功能、相机水印可编辑、防跟踪、智慧识物和购物功能，优化通知栏显示效果和动效体验，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增相机水印可编辑功能，可自行添加和还原水印，体验路径：拍照>打开照片>编辑>水印>水印选择：原图、文字水印、相框水印。
新增分屏保存功能，分屏状态下点击分屏线中间按钮，可将分屏组合以图标形式保存在桌面，后续通过点击该图标即可快捷打开此分屏组合。
新增防跟踪功能，体验路径：平行空间>设置>位置和广告>选择位置跟踪管理或广告跟踪管理。
新增智慧识物和智慧购物功能。
优化文件夹打断动效、图库旋转动效、快捷方式返回桌面动效等流畅动效体验。
优化通知栏布局显示，界面呈现更加简洁美观。
合入安卓2024年7月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/7
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this recommended update includes App combinations in split-screen mode can be saved. Watermarks can be edited. This update also introduces Anti-tracking function, AI object recognition and AI shopping functions. Additionally, this release optimizes the display effect of notification panel and the motion effect experience, and incorporates a security patch.
Watermarks can now be added and removed as desired. You can experience it by going to: Take a photo > Open the photo > Edit > Watermark > Watermark options: Original, Text watermark, Frame watermark.

App combinations in split-screen mode can now be saved. In split-screen mode, tap the button in the middle of the divider to save the combination as an icon on the home screen. Tap the icon enables quick access to the combination.
Anti-tracking function is incorporated. Experience it by going to: Parallel Space > Settings > Location and advertising > Select Location preferences or Ad preferences.
AI object recognition and AI shopping functions are introduced.

The animation is optimized when the process of opening a folder is interrupted. Additionally, the motion effects for screen rotation in Gallery and for returning to the home screen from a shortcut are enhanced.
The layout of notification panel is optimized, making the interface more streamlined and visually appealing.

Android Security Patch (July 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/7

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but a backup beforehand is still recommended. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
